import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'angularapp'; }
First Name is required, should be between 3 and 50 characters, and can only contain alphabets.
Gender is required
Country is required
City is required
Age is required for selected countries (US, Canada, India)
